gnd_control.model

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Connection>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SerialConnection, TCPConnection, UDPConnection, WHOIConnection

    public interface Connection
extends java.lang.Comparable<Connection>
    Connection interface defines all the methods that have to be implemented for a connection to the drone.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Add an observer to this connection.

      Connects to the drone using this connection.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects form the drone, closes any open file descriptors.

      Compares two connections based on their name.

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(ConnectionObserver c)
        Add an observer to this connection. The observer will be notified of all arriving packets.
        Parameters:
        c - observer to be added.

        Parameters:
